import React from"react";import'./style.css';// import { Link } from "react-router-dom";
export function BtnSubmit(props){return React.createElement("button",{className:props.className,onClick:props.onClick,style:{fontWeight:'bold'}},props.children);}export function BtnView(props){return React.createElement("a",{className:props.className,href:props.link,onClick:props.onClick,style:{fontWeight:'bold'},target:props.target},props.children);}export function BtnSave(props){return React.createElement("button",{className:props.isSaved?'btn btn-secondary card-btn':'btn btn-success card-btn',onClick:props.onClick,style:{fontWeight:'bold'}},props.isSaved?"SAVED":"SAVE");}
